com.haru

Interface JsonEncodable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateEntityOperation, DeleteFieldOperation, Entity, HaruFile, Installation, Operation, OperationSet, Param, UpdateOperation, User

    public interface JsonEncodable
    JSON 형식으로 인코딩되어야 하는 데이터 클래스에 사용된다.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object toJson()
      객체를 JSON으로 Marshalling한다.

    • Method Detail

      • toJson

                        throws java.lang.Exception
        객체를 JSON으로 Marshalling한다.
        Returns:
        JSON (or @link org.json.JSONArray
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - usually JSONException
